Youâ€™ve gone beyond what I could ever expect, even planning to get me a new MacBook. Thatâ€™s truly generous and thoughtful, and it shows what a beautiful heart you have. May Allah reward you abundantly for every good deed youâ€™ve doneâ€¦â€¦. I pray for you and your family every day. May He shower your entire family with endless blessings and provide you with a life full of joy, prosperity, and contentmentâ€¦â€¦.. I just want you to know that Iâ€™m truly grateful for all youâ€™ve done, and Iâ€™m praying for the best for you in every aspect of your lifeâ€¦â€¦Jazakallahu khairan, and may Allah always be with you
